Thu Dec 28 03:09:05 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/include
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libksba-1.6.5/include/ksba.h /opt/include//ksba.h
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib//pkgconfig
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libksba-1.6.5/lib/libksba.so.8.14.5 /opt/lib//libksba.so.8.14.5
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libksba-1.6.5/lib/libksba.so /opt/lib//libksba.so
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libksba-1.6.5/lib/libksba.so.8 /opt/lib//libksba.so.8
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libksba-1.6.5/lib/pkgconfig/ksba.pc /opt/lib//pkgconfig/ksba.pc
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libksba-1.6.5/lib/libksba.la /opt/lib//libksba.la
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//info
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//aclocal
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libksba-1.6.5/share/info/dir /opt/share//info/dir
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libksba-1.6.5/share/info/ksba.info /opt/share//info/ksba.info
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libksba-1.6.5/share/aclocal/ksba.m4 /opt/share//aclocal/ksba.m4
